name.description: The common name of the railway company.

abbreviation.description: The abbreviation or short code for the company.

country.description: The country where the company operates.

status.description: Whether the company is currently active or defunct.

full_registered_name.description: The full legal or registered name of the company.

company_type.description: Type of company (e.g., state-owned, private, freight, passenger, etc.).

defunct_year.description: Year the company became defunct, or null if still active.

website.description: Official website URL, or null if not available.
